name: Sword of the Morel
description:
Sword of the Morel is a Adventure Platformer about a little mushroom named Mica. After their village is swooped away by a bird, Mica must use their grandma's old sword, the blade of grass, to save the village.

How to Play:

A & D to Move left and right.

Tap Space to Jump and Hold Space to Glide.

Move the Mouse to position the sword. 

Tip: When the sword hits the ground the player's movement is locked so try to find ways to lift it off the ground to move across

Right Click to Equip and Unequip the sword.

E to Interact with objects and chat to villagers.

P to Pause the game.
